titleStmt.title: The covenant of grace or An exposition upon Luke 1. 73.74.75. By George Downame Doctour of Divinity, and Bishop of Dery
titleStmt.author: Downame, George, d. 1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the Society of Stationers, printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "A treatise of the certainty of perseverance" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
With two final errata leaves preceded by a blank leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
